NSW.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC
2. Electrical contractor license or Restricted Electrical Work License

Condition - QBCC Mechanical Services licence is also required for AC jobs over $3,300.00

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

abn_conditions.company: Company ABN – Must supply a licence that is in the Company's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.individual: Individual/Sole Trader ABN – Must supply a licence that is in the Individual/Sole Trader's Name
abn_conditions.partnership: Partnership ABN – Must supply a licence under the Partnership's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.trust: Trust ABN – Must supply a licence under the Trustee of the Trust (can be company or individual, T&Q will ask for a trust deed)

QLD.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence and 
2. either VIC Plumbing (Refrigerated Air-conditioning) licence or VIC EnergySafe Electrical Contractor or D Licence
**VIC Energysafe Electrician A licence does not cover this category.

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

abn_conditions.company: Company ABN – Must supply a licence that is in the Company's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.individual: Individual/Sole Trader ABN – Must supply a licence that is in the Individual/Sole Trader's Name
abn_conditions.partnership: Partnership ABN – Must supply a licence under the Partnership's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.trust: Trust ABN – Must supply a licence under the Trustee of the Trust (can be company or individual, T&Q will ask for a trust deed)

VIC.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence and 
2. Unrestricted Electrical Licence or Restricted – Electrotechnology Systems Refrigeration and Air-Conditioning Licence.

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

abn_conditions.company: Company ABN – Must supply a licence that is in the Company's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.individual: Individual/Sole Trader ABN – Must supply a licence that is in the Individual/Sole Trader's Name
abn_conditions.partnership: Partnership ABN – Must supply a licence under the Partnership's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.trust: Trust ABN – Must supply a licence under the Trustee of the Trust (can be company or individual, T&Q will ask for a trust deed)

abn_conditions.trust: Trust ABN – Must supply a licence under the Trustee of the Trust (can be company or individual, T&Q will ask for a trust deed)

NT.licence_note:
Category can be added without a licence however, condition applies:
 **Condition - Licence is required for Accessing, disconnecting, or interfering with any refrigerant circuit (e.g. coil cleaning that requires dismantling parts with refrigerant).

abn_conditions.company: Company ABN – Must supply a licence that is in the Company's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.individual: Individual/Sole Trader ABN – Must supply a licence that is in the Individual/Sole Trader's Name
abn_conditions.partnership: Partnership ABN – Must supply a licence under the Partnership's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.trust: Trust ABN – Must supply a licence under the Trustee of the Trust (can be company or individual, T&Q will ask for a trust deed)

ACT.licence_note:
Category can be added without a licence however, condition applies:
 **Condition - Licence is required for Accessing, disconnecting, or interfering with any refrigerant circuit (e.g. coil cleaning that requires dismantling parts with refrigerant).

abn_conditions.company: Company ABN – Must supply a licence that is in the Company's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.individual: Individual/Sole Trader ABN – Must supply a licence that is in the Individual/Sole Trader's Name
abn_conditions.partnership: Partnership ABN – Must supply a licence under the Partnership's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.trust: Trust ABN – Must supply a licence under the Trustee of the Trust (can be company or individual, T&Q will ask for a trust deed)

NSW.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC
2. Electrical contractor license or Restricted Electrical Work License

Condition - QBCC Mechanical Services licence is also required for AC jobs over $3,300.00

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

abn_conditions.company: Must supply a licence that is in the Company's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.individual: Must supply a licence that is in the Individual/Sole Trader's Name
abn_conditions.partnership: Must supply a licence under the Partnership's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.trust: Must supply a licence under the Trustee of the Trust (can be company or individual, trust deed may be required)

QLD.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence and 
2. either VIC Plumbing (Refrigerated Air-conditioning) licence or VIC EnergySafe Electrical Contractor or D Licence
**VIC Energysafe Electrician A licence does not cover this category.

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

abn_conditions.company: Must supply a licence that is in the Company's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.individual: Must supply a licence that is in the Individual/Sole Trader's Name
abn_conditions.partnership: Must supply a licence under the Partnership's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.trust: Must supply a licence under the Trustee of the Trust (can be company or individual, trust deed may be required)

VIC.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence and 
2. Unrestricted Electrical Licence or Restricted – Electrotechnology Systems Refrigeration and Air-Conditioning Licence.

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

abn_conditions.company: Must supply a licence that is in the Company's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.individual: Must supply a licence that is in the Individual/Sole Trader's Name
abn_conditions.partnership: Must supply a licence under the Partnership's ABN Entity Name
abn_conditions.trust: Must supply a licence under the Trustee of the Trust (can be company or individual, trust deed may be required)
